summary: This document appears to be a list of exhibits or an introduction to a filing, likely from the Office of the Inspector General, referencing key documents related to the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death. It lists an autopsy report, indictment, psychological reconstruction, and a court order.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the listed exhibits, including his autopsy report, indictment, and psychological reconstruction from prison.

events.title: Autopsy Report Issued
events.description: The Office of the Chief Medical Examiner, City of New York, issued an autopsy report regarding Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Epstein Indictment Filed
events.description: An indictment was filed against Jeffrey Epstein in the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: BOP Psychological Reconstruction
events.description: The Federal Bureau of Prisons completed a psychological reconstruction regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Court Order Remanding Defendant
events.description: A Decision and Order was filed in the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York to remand defendant Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York
Office of the Chief Medical Examiner, City of New York
keyFacts: The document references an autopsy report on Jeffrey Epstein dated August 11, 2019, conducted by the NYC Medical Examiner.
It lists a federal indictment against Jeffrey Epstein filed on July 2, 2019.
A Federal Bureau of Prisons psychological reconstruction on Epstein was completed on September 17, 2019.
A court order remanding Epstein was issued on July 18, 2019.
The document is associated with a U.S. Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General case (EFTA00039356).
